DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate clinical effectiveness non-carious cervical lesion ( NCCLs ) restore two self-etching adhesive system apply without selective enamel etching .
DOC.brief_title: Selective Enamel Etching Self-etching Adhesives : 2-year Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate clinical effectiveness non-carious cervical lesion ( NCCLs ) restore two self-etching adhesive system : Clearfil SE Bond ( Kuraray Noritake , Japan ) Xeno V + ( Dentsply De Trey , Germany ) apply without 36 % phosphoric acid enamel etch . Assessments baseline , 3 , 6 , 12 , 18 24 month clinical service .
DOC.criteria: Be least 18 year ; Present least 4 NCCLs vital teeth margin enamel dentin ( large area dentin ) , independently teeth location ; Nonsmoking ; Read sign Statement Informed Consent . Compromised medical history ; Severe chronic periodontitis ; Extreme caries sensitivity ; Heavy bruxism ; Under orthodontic treatment ; Poor oral hygiene ; Smokers .
